io.spine.server.commandbus

Class ExecutorCommandScheduler

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.spine.server.commandbus.CommandScheduler
      • io.spine.server.commandbus.ExecutorCommandScheduler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    io.spine.logging.Logging, BusFilter<CommandEnvelope>, Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class ExecutorCommandScheduler
extends CommandScheduler
implements io.spine.logging.Logging
    The command scheduler implementation which uses basic Java task scheduling features.

    NOTE: please use another implementation in applications running under the Google App Engine.

    See Also:
    ScheduledExecutorService

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ExecutorCommandScheduler()

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected void doSchedule(io.spine.core.Command command)
      Schedules a command and delivers it to the target according to the scheduling options set to a context.
      void shutdown()
      Initiates an orderly shutdown in which previously scheduled commands will be delivered later, but no new commands will be accepted.

      • doSchedule

        protected void doSchedule(io.spine.core.Command command)
        Description copied from class: CommandScheduler
        Schedules a command and delivers it to the target according to the scheduling options set to a context.
        Specified by:

        Parameters:
        command - a command to deliver later
        See Also:
        CommandScheduler.post(Command)

      • shutdown

        public void shutdown()
        Description copied from class: CommandScheduler
        Initiates an orderly shutdown in which previously scheduled commands will be delivered later, but no new commands will be accepted.

        Invocation has no effect if the scheduler is already shut down.

        Overrides:
        shutdown in class CommandScheduler
